Reviews.Title: Freezes at the worst times - daily
Reviews.Author: jeffrey horton
Reviews.Content: I have one of these, and in just over a year, the phone requires multiple reboots daily.System freezes forcing battery removal the unit is unreliable.I have been looking at trying to upgrade the OS, but from what I read cannot do this in Canada on this phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Disappointment!
Reviews.Author: Conny Albert
Reviews.Content: Motorola informed me (post purchase) that this particular phone is designed for Canadian System use.There are limitations as to what I can do with this phone and often times the phone doesn't do what it is suppose to do.I would never have bought this phone had I known of its complications.
